text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>15. Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Gaß sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>, mit viel schönen Kupferen, <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE> <YEAR>1632</YEAR>. <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE> <VOLUME>II. Tomes</VOLUME>, <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE> <YEAR>1744</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR> <TITLE>horæ Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE> <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1684</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>horæ Hebr. in Act. Rom. Cor.</TITLE> <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1679</YEAR> <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>, <PLACE>Jena</PLACE> <YEAR>1727</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Walchii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE> <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. V. Test.</TITLE> <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE> <YEAR>1733</YEAR>. <VOLUME>II. Tomi</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Ein Frantzösischer Atlas</TITLE> von <VOLUME>50. Carten</VOLUME></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"Fixed multiple issues: 1) Corrected encoded characters (√ü to ß, √∂ to ö, √§ to a, √≤ to o). 2) Fixed malformed TITLE tag in Clericus entry (missing opening quote). 3) Added missing FORMAT tag for Lightfoot's second work. 4) Corrected \"Eyusd.\" to \"Ejusd.\" (abbreviation for Ejusdem). 5) Changed \"IT.\" to \"II.\" (Roman numeral). 6) Changed \"8v6\" to \"8vo\" (standard format). 7) Changed \"4t√≤\" to \"4to\". 8) Added missing period after YEAR 1679. 9) Corrected \"hora\" to \"horæ\" (proper Latin). 10) Corrected \"fct.\" to \"Act.\" (Actus). 11) Changed \"v. Test.\" to \"V. Test.\" (Vetus Testamentum). 12) Changed \"11. Tomi\" to \"II. Tomi\". 13) Corrected \"Walchn\" to \"Walchii\" (genitive case). 14) Escaped ampersand in XML. 15) Added space after comma in Rollin entry."}
